trans-unit.source: If you are "finished making edits to the translation of each segment, you can use the 'Approve All' button to mark the rest of the translated segments as approved in bulk. You'll still be able to make additional edits afterwards.

seg-source.mrk: If you are "finished making edits to the translation of each segment, you can use the 'Approve All' button to mark the rest of the translated segments as approved in bulk.
You'll still be able to make additional edits afterwards.

target.mrk: If you are "finished making edits to the translation of each segment, you can use the 'Approve All' button to mark the rest of the translated segments as approved in bulk.
You'll still be able to make additional edits afterwards.
